pages.text: Affects fury spells only. An additional 1 Fury XP gained on spell-cast, and adds 0.2 flat damage. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_lethality)Path of Lethality$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter absorbs your inner fury and channels it through its spells. Imbues onto the Furious Scepter and persists on the Path of Lethality and the Path of the Equinox
